flawed_nl_solution:
November has 30 days, December has 31 days, January has 31 days and February has 28 days for a total of 30+31+31+28 = <<30+31+31+28=210>>210 days
He burns 5 pieces of wood every day so 210*5 = <<210*5=1050>>1050 pieces of wood
Every tree he cuts down supplies 75 pieces of firewood and he will burn 1050 pieces so he needs 1050/75 = <<1050/75=14>>14 trees
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 210. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
